item.title: Ted Evans Probes an Insular Deaf Community in Drama ’Retreat’: ‘I Saw an Opportunity to Explore the Construct of Identity Within the Structure of a Cult’
item.description: Ted Evans’ “Retreat” takes place outside society: Its characters, living in a compound called Chilmark, share a deaf identity but refuse to call themselves deaf, declaring that that label was foisted
